name: Vapoured Waves
description:
DISCLAIMER! This game contains flashing images and lots of visual distorition. Take caution if you are senitive to those phenomenon.

A vaporwave game.

Controls:
Joystick = Move
B = Jump
Down + A = Dive
Y = Shoot
Esc = Menu

In Menus:
B = Select Item

Mine through the vaporwave and collect nostalgia. Then climb back up and escape.
